snippet.title: Shields of Loyalty | First Look | indie.io
snippet.description:
Wishlist Shields of Loyalty now on Steam here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1318240/Shields_of_Loyalty/

Experience tactically challenging turn-based strategy in the hostile island world of Mantaria. Command a dynamic army of various unit types and classes to slay a dark and possessed undead army. Train forces into powerful warriors and fight fervently until the snake's head is at your feet!
